H0.text: A thicker neck and longer tail would most likely help a species living in an area whose climate has changed over time to become very cold survive.

H1.text: A larger mouth and stronger jaws would most likely help a species living in an area that has become very cold to survive.

H2.text: An increase in fur and fat is the change most likely to help a species survive if the climate in an area changes over time to become very cold.

H3.text: An increase in height and speed would most likely help a species living in an area that has become very cold to survive.

A4.text: Some animals... fur grows more densely to increase the amount of insulation.

A5.text: To remain in 'stasis' for long periods, these animals build up brown fat reserves...
